text: Steven G. Bradbury (born September 12, 1958) is an American politician. He is a member of the Republican Party who was the acting Secretary of Transportation after Secretary Chao had resigned due to the storming of the United States Capitol. ==Notes== Category:1958 births Category:Lawyers from Portland, Oregon Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Portland, Oregon Category:Living people
title: Steven G. Bradbury
